allow: Bash(for file in README.md SETUP.md PROJECT_SUMMARY.md GHL_INTEGRATION.md CREDENTIALS.md)
Bash(for file in Login.js Dashboard.js Sidebar.js)
Bash(for file in Integrations.js TeamManagement.js AdvancedAnalytics.js WhiteLabel.js)
Bash(if not exist backendservices mkdir backendservices)
Bash(if not exist backendsrcroutes mkdir backendsrcroutes)
